duration_raw: until the end of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Sudden Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=454)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 397 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself. You Step and become concealed.
name: Sudden Shift
